benefits.title: Original Artwork
benefits.description: 100% custom design, never templates or clip art.

benefits.title: Revision Rounds
benefits.description: Iterative feedback process to perfect the design.

benefits.title: Multiple Concepts
benefits.description: Explore different creative directions before committing.

benefits.title: Vector Files
benefits.description: Scalable formats that stay crisp at any size.

benefits.title: Logo Portal Access
benefits.description: Download any format, size, or file type whenever you need it.

benefits.title: Full Ownership
benefits.description: Complete rights and source files delivered to you.

upsells.title: Brand Guidelines
upsells.description: Document specifying colors, typography, spacing, and usage rules.

upsells.title: Stationery Suite
upsells.description: Business cards, letterhead, and envelope designs.

upsells.title: Social Media Kit
upsells.description: Profile images, cover photos, and post templates.

defaultPhases.name: Discovery & Concepting
defaultPhases.description: Review existing materials, research visual language, and develop initial concept sketches.

defaultPhases.name: Initial Design Exploration
defaultPhases.description: Present 2-3 distinct logo concepts with variations showing different applications.

defaultPhases.name: Refinement & Revisions
defaultPhases.description: Refine selected concept based on feedback. Includes up to two revision rounds.

defaultPhases.name: Final Delivery
defaultPhases.description: Complete logo package: vector source files (AI, EPS, SVG), high-res rasters (PNG, JPG) in RGB and CMYK.
